description.value:
This magic ring seems like simple tarnished brass, but it enhances your curiosity about traps and devices of all kinds.

You can use an Interact action to pull a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Thieves' Toolkit] from the ring. This toolkit appears in your hand and any part of it folds back into the ring if they would leave your possession.

They grant you a +2 item bonus to Thievery checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disable a Device] and to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pick a Lock], and the ring's insights grant you the same bonus to Crafting checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Repair] snares and traps.

Activateâ€”Fireball Trap 10 minutes (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You create the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rune Trap] trap ritual containing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball]. You can have only one trapped rune from a ring of maniacal devices active at a time, even if you have multiple rings, and the rune disappears if you lose your investiture in the ring.
